Package groupOfCards

Class Pile

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupOfCards.Deck
      • groupOfCards.Pile

  • public class Pile
extends Deck
    Defines a pile, where a player lays the card he wants to play. It owns his own property to keep in memory the value of the card at the top, and the current color, that can be different from the current card.
    Author:
    Benjamin Héroult

      • Fields inherited from class groupOfCards.Deck

      • getInst

        public static final Pile getInst​()
        static method called instead of the constructor, to assure that the class Pile is instantiated only once.

        the value of the variable that allow to keep in memory the number of class' instances

      • addCard

        public void addCard​(Card cardToAdd)
        Adds a card to the pile, and puts it on the top. Changes the current color and the current value of the game.
        Parameters:
        cardToAdd - the card to add to the pile
